description: Episode of Series "Biology Program. Unit 5. Heredity and Adaptive Change". Portrays the biochemical mechanisms of inheritance. Shows how the DNA of chromosomes can replicate itself during mitosis and how it can serve as a pattern for the "messenger" DNA. Suitable for upper secondary level.
